options: This is my mother. Her name is Anna.
This is my father. His name is Anna.
This is my sister. She is Anna.

options: I like to play football in my free time.
I like to watch football on TV.

challenges.description_no: Hør noen beskrive reisen til jobb

options: I take the bus to work every day.
I drive to work every day.
I walk to work every day.
I take the train to work.

challenges.audio_text: Jeg gikk på kino i går kveld.
options: I went to the cinema yesterday evening.
I will go to the cinema tomorrow.
I like going to the cinema.

verification_prompts.text: Describe your friend using: Han/Hun er... (tall/short/young), Han/Hun har... (hair color)

challenges.title: Listen: Weekend plans

challenges.audio_text: Hva skal du gjøre i helgen? Jeg skal besøke familien min.
options: What will you do this weekend? I will visit my family.
Where did you go last weekend?

challenges.title: Fill in: Future plans
challenges.description: Complete the sentence about future plans
challenges.sentence: Jeg ___ besøke Norge neste år.

challenges.title: Express opinion
challenges.description: How do you say 'I think that...'?

challenges.title: Have a conversation in Norwegian
challenges.description: Have a 2-3 minute conversation with someone in Norwegian about your week
challenges.description_no: Ha en 2-3 minutters samtale med noen på norsk om uken din
challenges.mission_description: Talk with someone about your week in Norwegian for at least 2 minutes. Take a photo or note afterward.

verification_prompts.photo: Take a photo after your conversation (optional)
verification_prompts.text: Describe what you talked about and how it went

challenges.title: Listen: Travel problem
challenges.description: Listen to someone explaining a travel issue
challenges.audio_text: Unnskyld, toget mitt er forsinket. Når går neste tog til Bergen?
options: Excuse me, my train is delayed. When does the next train to Bergen leave?
Excuse me, where is the train to Bergen?
I missed my train to Bergen.
The train to Bergen is cancelled.

challenges.title: Listen: Job description
challenges.description: Listen to someone describing their job
challenges.audio_text: Jeg jobber som lærer på en barneskole. Jeg har jobbet der i fem år.
options: I work as a teacher at a primary school. I have worked there for five years.
I want to become a teacher.
I studied to be a teacher.

challenges.title: Listen: Health complaint
challenges.description: Listen to someone describing symptoms
challenges.audio_text: Jeg har vondt i halsen og hodet. Jeg tror jeg er forkjølet.
options: I have a sore throat and head. I think I have a cold.
I need to see a doctor immediately.

challenges.title: Listen: Explaining why
challenges.description: Listen to someone explaining their reason
challenges.audio_text: Jeg lærer norsk fordi jeg vil flytte til Norge og jobbe der.
options: I'm learning Norwegian because I want to move to Norway and work there.
I don't speak Norwegian very well.

challenges.title: Fill in: Reason conjunction
challenges.description: Complete with the correct conjunction
challenges.sentence: Jeg ble hjemme ___ jeg var syk.

challenges.title: Fill in: Time conjunction
challenges.description: Complete with the correct conjunction
challenges.sentence: Jeg ringer deg ___ jeg kommer hjem.

challenges.description: Complete with the comparative form
challenges.sentence: Oslo er ___ enn Bergen.

challenges.description: Complete the sentence about hopes
challenges.sentence: Jeg ___ at jeg kan besøke Norge snart.

challenges.description: Select the correct word for 'experience'
challenges.prompt: I have five years of work experience

challenges.title: Choose: Better
challenges.description: Select the comparative form
challenges.prompt: This book is better than that one
options: Denne boken er bedre enn den

challenges.description: Visit a train station and ask about schedules in Norwegian
challenges.description_no: Besøk en togstasjon og spør om rutetider på norsk
challenges.mission_description: Go to a train/bus station and ask: 'Når går neste tog/buss til...?' Take a photo of the station.

verification_prompts.photo: Take a photo at the train or bus station
verification_prompts.text: Write what you asked and what the answer was

challenges.title: Describe your job
challenges.description: Take a photo at your workplace and describe your job in Norwegian
challenges.description_no: Ta et bilde på arbeidsplassen din og beskriv jobben din på norsk
challenges.mission_description: Photograph your workplace (or study place) and write about your job/studies using: Jeg jobber/studerer som..., Jeg har jobbet/studert der i...

verification_prompts.text: Describe your job or studies in 3-4 sentences in Norwegian

challenges.description: Visit a pharmacy and ask for something in Norwegian
challenges.description_no: Besøk et apotek og spør etter noe på norsk
challenges.mission_description: Go to a pharmacy and ask for something simple like 'Har dere noe mot hodepine?' Take a photo outside.

verification_prompts.photo: Take a photo of the pharmacy
verification_prompts.text: Write what you asked for and what happened

challenges.title: Write about your dreams
challenges.description: Write about your future ambitions in Norwegian
challenges.description_no: Skriv om fremtidsambisjonene dine på norsk
challenges.mission_description: Take a photo that represents your dream/goal and write about it using: Jeg drømmer om å..., Jeg håper at..., fordi...

verification_prompts.photo: Take a photo that represents your dream or goal
verification_prompts.text: Write 4-5 sentences about your ambitions using subordinate clauses (fordi, at, når)

challenges.title: Listen: News report
challenges.description: Listen to a news summary about society
challenges.audio_text: Regjeringen har besluttet å øke investeringene i fornybar energi med 20 prosent neste år.
options: The government has decided to increase investments in renewable energy by 20 percent next year.
The government will reduce energy costs by 20 percent.
The government is closing 20 percent of power plants.
The government announced new energy taxes.

challenges.title: Listen: Opinion debate
challenges.description: Listen to someone presenting pros and cons
challenges.description_no: Hør noen presentere fordeler og ulemper
challenges.audio_text: På den ene siden gir hjemmekontor mer fleksibilitet, men på den andre siden kan det føre til isolasjon.
options: On one hand, working from home gives more flexibility, but on the other hand it can lead to isolation.
Working from home is always better than office work.
Working from home is not allowed anymore.

challenges.title: Listen: Abstract concept
challenges.description: Listen to a discussion about an abstract topic
challenges.description_no: Hør en diskusjon om et abstrakt tema
challenges.audio_text: Lykke handler ikke bare om materielle ting, men også om meningsfulle relasjoner og personlig vekst.
options: Happiness is not just about material things, but also about meaningful relationships and personal growth.
Happiness comes from buying expensive things.
Personal growth is not important for happiness.

challenges.title: Listen: Technical explanation
challenges.description: Listen to a technical description
challenges.audio_text: Systemet oppdateres automatisk hver natt for å sikre at alle sikkerhetsoppdateringer blir installert.
options: The system updates automatically every night to ensure all security updates are installed.
Updates must be done manually every day.

challenges.title: Listen: Social issue
challenges.description: Listen to a discussion about society
challenges.audio_text: Selv om arbeidsledigheten har gått ned, er det fortsatt mange som sliter med å finne fast jobb.
options: Although unemployment has decreased, there are still many who struggle to find permanent work.
Unemployment is no longer a problem.
Everyone can easily find a job now.
There are no permanent jobs available.

challenges.title: Fill in: Passive voice
challenges.description: Complete with the passive form
challenges.sentence: Rapporten ___ ferdig i morgen.

challenges.title: Fill in: Concession
challenges.description: Complete with the concessive conjunction
challenges.sentence: ___ det regnet, gikk vi på tur.

challenges.title: Fill in: Formal connector
challenges.description: Complete with the formal connector
challenges.sentence: Prosjektet er godt planlagt. ___ har vi et sterkt team.

challenges.title: Fill in: Conditional
challenges.description: Complete the conditional sentence
challenges.sentence: Hvis jeg hadde visst det, ___ jeg kommet tidligere.

challenges.title: Fill in: Concessive adverb
challenges.description: Complete with the appropriate word
challenges.sentence: ___ hva andre mener, må du følge din egen overbevisning.

challenges.title: Choose: Formal expression
challenges.description: Select the most formal way to express this
challenges.description_no: Velg den mest formelle måten å uttrykke dette på

challenges.title: Choose: Expressing disagreement
challenges.description: Select the polite way to disagree
challenges.description_no: Velg den høflige måten å være uenig på
challenges.prompt: I see your point, but I disagree
options: Jeg forstår poenget ditt, men jeg er uenig

challenges.title: Choose: News vocabulary
challenges.description: Select the correct news term

challenges.title: Choose: Abstract noun
challenges.description: Select the correct abstract concept
options: Frihet til å rope er viktig

challenges.title: Choose: Technical term
challenges.description: Select the correct technical expression

challenges.title: Summarize a news article
challenges.description: Read a Norwegian news article and write a summary
challenges.description_no: Les en norsk nyhetsartikkel og skriv et sammendrag
challenges.mission_description: Find a Norwegian news article online (NRK, VG, Aftenposten), take a screenshot, and write a 5-6 sentence summary in Norwegian.

verification_prompts.photo: Take a screenshot of the news article
verification_prompts.text: Write a 5-6 sentence summary of the article in Norwegian

challenges.title: Write a pros and cons list
challenges.title_no: Skriv en fordeler og ulemper liste
challenges.description: Choose a topic and write pros and cons in Norwegian
challenges.description_no: Velg et tema og skriv fordeler og ulemper på norsk
challenges.mission_description: Choose a debatable topic (e.g., electric cars, remote work) and write 3 pros and 3 cons in Norwegian using: På den ene siden..., På den andre siden..., Dessuten..., Selv om...

verification_prompts.photo: Take a photo related to your chosen topic
verification_prompts.text: Write 3 pros and 3 cons using formal connectors

challenges.title: Write a formal email
challenges.description: Write a formal email requesting information
challenges.description_no: Skriv en formell e-post der du ber om informasjon
challenges.mission_description: Write a formal email (not sent) requesting information from a company or institution. Use: Jeg vil gjerne be om..., Med vennlig hilsen, Vedlagt finner du...

verification_prompts.photo: Take a screenshot of your written email
verification_prompts.text: The email should include greeting, request, closing - all in formal Norwegian

challenges.title: Interview someone in Norwegian
challenges.description: Conduct a short interview about their opinions
challenges.description_no: Gjennomfør et kort intervju om meningene deres
challenges.mission_description: Interview someone in Norwegian about a social topic. Ask their opinion and follow-up questions. Write down their main points.

verification_prompts.photo: Take a photo with the person you interviewed (with permission)
verification_prompts.text: Write what topic you discussed and summarize their opinions in 4-5 sentences

challenges.title: Explain a process
challenges.description: Explain how something works in technical Norwegian
challenges.description_no: Forklar hvordan noe fungerer på teknisk norsk
challenges.mission_description: Choose something from your field/hobby (software, cooking, sports technique) and write a step-by-step explanation in Norwegian using passive voice and technical vocabulary.

verification_prompts.photo: Take a photo of what you're explaining
verification_prompts.text: Write a 5-6 step explanation using technical terms and passive constructions

challenges.title: Listen: Norwegian idiom
challenges.description: Listen and understand the idiomatic expression
challenges.description_no: Hør og forstå det idiomatiske uttrykket
challenges.audio_text: Du må ha is i magen. Dette tar tid, men det kommer til å ordne seg.
options: You need to stay calm. This takes time, but it will work out.
You need ice for your stomach. This takes time.
You need to eat ice cream. Then it will work out.
You need cold medicine. This is taking too long.

challenges.title: Listen: Implicit meaning
challenges.description: Understand what is implied but not directly stated
challenges.description_no: Forstå hva som er underforstått men ikke direkte uttalt
challenges.audio_text: Vel, det var jo en interessant presentasjon. Kanskje vi kan diskutere noen av tallene litt nærmere etterpå.
options: The speaker has concerns about the accuracy of the presentation.
The speaker loved the presentation completely.
The speaker wants to give a presentation themselves.

challenges.title: Listen: Academic lecture
challenges.description: Listen to an academic-style explanation
challenges.audio_text: Forskningen antyder at klimaendringene i større grad påvirker kystområder, noe som nødvendiggjør en revurdering av eksisterende infrastruktur.
options: Research suggests climate change affects coastal areas more, requiring infrastructure reassessment.
Research shows the climate is fine in coastal areas.
Coastal infrastructure is the cause of climate change.
We should build more in coastal areas.

challenges.title: Listen: Nuanced opinion
challenges.description: Understand the subtle distinction being made
challenges.description_no: Forstå den subtile distinksjonen som gjøres
challenges.audio_text: Jeg er ikke nødvendigvis imot forslaget, men jeg stiller spørsmål ved om timingen er riktig gitt de nåværende omstendighetene.
options: The speaker conditionally supports the proposal but questions its timing.
The speaker is completely against the proposal.
The speaker fully supports the proposal.
The speaker doesn't understand the proposal.

challenges.title: Listen: Professional negotiation
challenges.description: Understand the professional context and intent
challenges.description_no: Forstå den profesjonelle konteksten og intensjonen
challenges.audio_text: Vi setter pris på deres tilbud, men vi må ta i betraktning at markedsprisen har endret seg betydelig siden vårt siste møte.
options: They appreciate the offer but are negotiating for better terms due to market changes.
They want to end the negotiation.

challenges.title: Fill in: Idiom completion
challenges.description: Complete the Norwegian idiom
challenges.sentence: Han slo to fluer i én ___.
challenges.hint: hit/slap - accomplishing two things at once

challenges.title: Fill in: Academic connector
challenges.description: Complete with the academic transition word
challenges.sentence: Resultatene var overraskende. ___ bør de tolkes med forsiktighet.

challenges.title: Fill in: Hedging language
challenges.description: Complete with appropriate hedging
challenges.sentence: Dette ___ tyde på at hypotesen er korrekt.

challenges.title: Fill in: Formal request
challenges.description: Complete the formal professional phrase
challenges.sentence: Vi ___ vennligst om en tilbakemelding innen fredag.

challenges.title: Fill in: Diplomatic language
challenges.description: Complete with diplomatic phrasing
challenges.sentence: Med all ___ mener jeg at vi bør vurdere andre alternativer.

challenges.title: Choose: Idiom meaning
challenges.description: Select what this idiom means
challenges.prompt: Å ta noe for god fisk
options: To accept something at face value without questioning

challenges.title: Choose: Register appropriateness
challenges.description: Select the most appropriate for academic writing
challenges.description_no: Velg det mest passende for akademisk skriving

challenges.title: Choose: Subtle distinction
challenges.description: Select the word with the correct connotation
challenges.prompt: He is ___ (negative connotation for 'careful with money')

challenges.title: Choose: Academic vocabulary
challenges.description: Select the correct academic term

challenges.title: Choose: Implied meaning
challenges.description: What does this phrase imply?
challenges.prompt: 'Det gjenstår å se' (It remains to be seen)
options: The speaker is skeptical or uncertain about the outcome
The speaker is confident it will work
The speaker wants to see something

challenges.title: Write an academic summary
challenges.description: Summarize a research finding in academic Norwegian
challenges.description_no: Oppsummer et forskningsfunn på akademisk norsk
challenges.mission_description: Find a research article or study and write a 6-8 sentence academic summary using: Forskningen antyder..., Resultatene viser..., Ikke desto mindre..., Avslutningsvis...

verification_prompts.photo: Screenshot of the research article/study
verification_prompts.text: Write 6-8 sentence academic summary with formal connectors and hedging language

challenges.title: Use idioms in conversation
challenges.description: Have a conversation using Norwegian idioms
challenges.description_no: Ha en samtale der du bruker norske idiomer
challenges.mission_description: Have a conversation with a Norwegian speaker and naturally use at least 2 idioms (ha is i magen, slå to fluer i én smekk, etc.). Write about the context.

verification_prompts.photo: Photo from your conversation setting
verification_prompts.text: Describe the conversation and which idioms you used and how they responded

challenges.title: Write a business proposal
challenges.description: Write a professional business proposal or recommendation
challenges.description_no: Skriv et profesjonelt forretningsforslag eller anbefaling
challenges.mission_description: Write a short business proposal (real or practice) with proper formal structure: introduction, analysis, recommendation. Use professional vocabulary and diplomatic language.

verification_prompts.photo: Screenshot of your business proposal
verification_prompts.text: The proposal should demonstrate formal register, hedging language, and professional structure

challenges.title: Analyze a debate
challenges.description: Watch a Norwegian debate and analyze the arguments
challenges.description_no: Se en norsk debatt og analyser argumentene
challenges.mission_description: Watch a debate on NRK Debatten or similar. Write an analysis of the main arguments, noting implicit meanings, diplomatic language, and persuasion techniques used.

verification_prompts.photo: Screenshot of the debate program
verification_prompts.text: Write 6-8 sentences analyzing the arguments, implicit meanings, and rhetorical strategies

challenges.title: Switch registers
challenges.description: Write the same content in formal and informal register
challenges.description_no: Skriv det samme innholdet i formelt og uformelt register
challenges.mission_description: Choose a topic (e.g., requesting time off). Write two versions: one formal email to your boss, one informal message to a friend. Both should convey the same information.

verification_prompts.photo: Photo of both written versions side by side
verification_prompts.text: Explain the key differences in vocabulary, structure, and tone between the two versions

challenges.title: Listen: Dialect variation
challenges.description: Understand Norwegian with dialect features
challenges.audio_text: Æ vet ikkje ka du mein, men æ trur det blir bra til slutt.
options: I don't know what you mean, but I think it will be fine in the end. (Northern dialect)
I want to know what you mean.
I don't agree with you at all.
I know exactly what you mean.

challenges.title: Listen: Irony and sarcasm
challenges.description: Detect the ironic intent in the statement
challenges.description_no: Oppdag den ironiske hensikten i uttalelsen
challenges.audio_text: Ja, det var jo veldig overraskende at de ikke klarte å levere i tide igjen.
options: The speaker is being sarcastic - they expected the delay.
The speaker was genuinely surprised by the delay.
The speaker is happy about the delay.
The speaker doesn't care about deadlines.

challenges.title: Listen: Literary Norwegian
challenges.description: Understand archaic or literary expressions
challenges.audio_text: Således hadde han i årevis vært hjemsøkt av denne tanken, som ikke lot ham få fred.
options: Thus he had for years been haunted by this thought, which gave him no peace.
So he had forgotten the thought many years ago.
He had found peace after many years.
The thought made him very peaceful.

challenges.title: Listen: Precise distinction
challenges.description: Catch the precise nuance in word choice
challenges.description_no: Fang opp den presise nyansen i ordvalget
challenges.audio_text: Han påstod at han hadde rett, men jeg ville heller si at han antok det.
options: He claimed he was right, but I would rather say he assumed it. (Distinction: påstå vs anta)
He was definitely right about everything.

challenges.title: Listen: Colloquial speech
challenges.description: Understand informal colloquial expressions
challenges.audio_text: Det var helt texas på jobben i dag, alt gikk skeis og sjefen var fly forbanna.
options: It was total chaos at work today, everything went wrong and the boss was furious.
Everything was fine at work in Texas.
The boss was flying to Texas.
Work was very calm and peaceful.

challenges.title: Fill in: Literary connector
challenges.description: Complete with the literary/archaic word
challenges.sentence: Han vandret ___ gjennom skogen, fordypet i tanker.

challenges.title: Fill in: Precise synonym
challenges.description: Choose the word with exactly the right connotation
challenges.description_no: Velg ordet med nøyaktig riktig konnotasjon
challenges.sentence: Kritikken var ikke bare hard, den var regelrett ___.

challenges.title: Fill in: Colloquial expression
challenges.description: Complete the informal expression
challenges.sentence: Jeg gadd ikke å krangle mer, så jeg bare ___ det.

challenges.title: Fill in: Ironic understatement
challenges.description: Complete the understated expression
challenges.sentence: Det var ___ ikke det beste tidspunktet å ta opp det temaet på.

challenges.title: Fill in: Dialect awareness
challenges.description: Choose the standard Bokmål equivalent
challenges.sentence: Bergen dialect 'Ikkje' = Standard Bokmål '___'

challenges.title: Choose: Precise synonym
challenges.description: Select the word with the most precise meaning
challenges.description_no: Velg ordet med den mest presise betydningen
challenges.prompt: She looked at him ___ (with suspicion and doubt)

challenges.title: Choose: Literary vocabulary
challenges.description: Select the literary/elevated term

challenges.title: Choose: Slang meaning
challenges.description: What does this colloquial expression mean?

challenges.title: Choose: Detect irony
challenges.description: Which response is ironic?
challenges.prompt: After someone makes a big mistake: '___'

challenges.title: Choose: Identify dialect
challenges.description: Which dialect region uses this form?

challenges.title: Write a short story
challenges.description: Write a creative short story in literary Norwegian
challenges.description_no: Skriv en kreativ novelle på litterær norsk
challenges.mission_description: Write a 10-15 sentence short story using literary vocabulary, varied sentence structures, and at least one metaphor or symbolism. Include dialogue with proper punctuation.

verification_prompts.photo: Photo of your written story or screenshot
verification_prompts.text: Your story should demonstrate literary vocabulary, metaphor/symbolism, and sophisticated sentence structures

challenges.title: Transcribe dialect speech
challenges.description: Listen to dialect speakers and transcribe to standard Norwegian
challenges.description_no: Hør på dialekttalere og transkriber til standard norsk
challenges.mission_description: Find a video with Norwegian dialects (NRK regional, YouTube). Transcribe 5-6 sentences in dialect, then write the standard Bokmål equivalent. Note the key differences.

verification_prompts.photo: Screenshot of the video source
verification_prompts.text: Write: 1) Original dialect transcription 2) Standard Bokmål translation 3) Explanation of main dialect features

challenges.title: Write a critical review
challenges.description: Write a nuanced critical review of something
challenges.description_no: Skriv en nyansert kritisk anmeldelse av noe
challenges.mission_description: Write a critical review (book, film, restaurant, product) demonstrating precise vocabulary choices, balanced arguments, and sophisticated hedging. Include both praise and criticism.

verification_prompts.photo: Photo of what you're reviewing
verification_prompts.text: 8-10 sentence review with precise adjectives, hedging language, and balanced critique

challenges.title: Document colloquial speech
challenges.description: Record and analyze informal Norwegian speech
challenges.description_no: Ta opp og analyser uformell norsk tale
challenges.mission_description: Listen to casual Norwegian conversation (friends, podcast, reality TV). Document 5 colloquial expressions/slang you hear. Write formal equivalents and explain when each would be used.

verification_prompts.photo: Screenshot or photo of your source
verification_prompts.text: List 5 colloquial expressions with: 1) Informal version 2) Formal equivalent 3) Context of use

challenges.title: Write satirical commentary
challenges.description: Write a satirical piece using irony and humor
challenges.description_no: Skriv et satirisk stykke med ironi og humor
challenges.mission_description: Write a satirical commentary on a current topic using irony, understatement, and Norwegian humor. The reader should understand your real opinion is opposite to what you literally say.

verification_prompts.photo: Photo related to your satirical topic
verification_prompts.text: 8-10 sentence satirical piece. Explain afterwards which techniques (irony, understatement) you used
